activities: Consensus Point provides Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions to clients to be used at their direction. Use of the Consensus Point solutions do not require individual personal information. Consensus Point offers a data center presence in the UK for EU clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consensus Point SaaS solutions do not require personal information.
recoursemech: Consensus Point is committed to working with appropriate data protection authorities (DPAs) to provide commercially diligent and reasonable response to all Safe Harbor requests for information.
